title: The Residents of Jerusalem
summary: To repopulate Jerusalem, lots are cast to select families who will live in the city. Leaders, priests, Levites, and other Israelites are assigned both inside Jerusalem and throughout surrounding towns.

faq.question: Why did they cast lots for people to live in Jerusalem?
faq.answer: Because many preferred rural life, so they needed volunteers to repopulate and protect the city.

faq.question: Who lived in Jerusalem?
faq.answer: Leaders, select families from Judah and Benjamin, priests, and temple servants.
